data.title: Hwali Airport, Hwali, Zimbabwe

data.text:
METAR Hwali Airport - ZW-0011

Hwali Airport is a small airport in Central, Zimbabwe. The airport is located at latitude -21.67991 and longitude 29.21866. This airport has no ICAO code, we use ZW-0011 as reference. The airport is in the Harare FIR.

This aviation weather observation was made for Bulawayo on August 28, 2024 06:00, local time.

Airport observations

There is little or no wind from a variable direction.

The weather is CAVOK. That means there are no clouds below 5,000 ft or the MSA (minimum safe altitude), whichever is higher. This also means that no cumulonimbus or towering cumulus clouds have been observed and the visibility is 10 km or more or more. Furthermore, there can't be fog, precipitation nor other significant weather.

The temperature is 10 °C, with a wind chill of 8 °C. The dew point is -2 °C, the relative humidity is 43%. The air pressure at sea level is 1022 hPa (QNH).

Daylight period

Today the sun rises at 06:15 and sets at 17:52. This applies to Hwali Airport, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +2 hour. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Companies

We don't have information about companies on this airport.
